overview: When your girlfriend dumps you for a supermodel, you will do almost anything to get her back. When Jade's long-time girlfriend Avi breaks up with her and runs off with supermodel Gianna Dior she's crushed. She takes a vacation alone and improbably ends up at the same resort as her ex and her new girlfriend! Will Jade and Avi ever get back together, or will Avi choose the life of supermodels and threesomes over true love?
tagline: You Have to Get Under Someone, To Get Over Someone, Right?
title: The Ex-Girlfriend Debacle
